title: #13: Is Monogamy a Real Thing? Working with friends and family, and how to stay positive when life gets tough.
description:
On this episode We address what it's like working with friends and family members and give our opinions on staying in a monogamous relationship. We also answer questions on How to deal with negativity and stay positive when life gets tough.

To learn more about The Skinny Confidential visit the site HERE
